p.s: In the given speech held on the first of novemberNovember 2021 Boris Johnson, describes the current situation in climate change and his approach on solving the problems.
Johnson begins with a short welome to the atendentsattendants.
After that he defribes the potential of climate change.
He follows with a description of the actions that are in the past and how they are not enough.
Then Johnson presents the main problem which is the financiation of future fight against climate change.
These financial resources are in the possession of the market.
He requests that all should try to work with the banks and corporations.
In the next part he informs the present world leaders about the effects on society with a focus on the youth.
In this part Johnson argues that not taking any actions or not suffiecient ones will put a life long guilt on them.
This guilt is to evade or else future generations will suffer.
Johnson then concludes his speech by describing the foundations on which the politicians have to base their fight against climate change.
Furthermore he states that Glasgow and COP26 can only begin an ongoing fight against climate change.
